sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, cast_info ci, movie_info mi
WHERE t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.kind_id  >  1 AND t.production_year  >  1983 AND ci.person_id  >  707229 AND mi.info_type_id  >  98

/*+ HashJoin(ci mi t)
 HashJoin(mi t)

 BitmapScan(t)
 Leading((ci (mi t))) */
